field.name: state
field.decoration-warning: state == 'new' or state == 'confirmed' or state == 'reserved' or state == 'approved'
field.decoration-danger: state == 'pending' or state == 'expired' or state == 'hold' or state == 'checked-out' or state == 'late'

gantt.decoration-info: state == 'confirmed' or state == 'pending' or state == 'approved' or state == 'new'

button.name: confirm_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to confirm this order?

button.name: pick_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Check-In this order?

button.name: return_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Check-Out this order?

button.name: reactivate_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to reactivate this order?

button.name: hold_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to hold this order?

button.name: close_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to close this order?

button.name: cancel_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

button.name: update_so
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to issue/update quotation for this order?

button.name: recalc_order
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to issue/update invoice for this order?

button.name: generate_access_caps
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear and update Access Rules?
